dmca.title: Osho International complains of blogged book text
dmca.body:
To Whom it May Concern: 

We have found a significant quantity of text material on a blog web site which is published without permission of the copyright owner. 

http://oshospeak.blogspot.com/ 

Almost the entire blog is filled in copyrighted material belonging to OSHO International Foundation. 

The above are unauthorized excerpts and publications. The original copyright notice has been removed from the video. 

Contact: [private]@oshointernational.com 

Attached please find a copy of US-Copyright Registration Certificate for OSHO BOOKS ON CD-ROM - an electronic publication including all of the text material infringed on this blog. The certificate is in the name of Osho International Foundation.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright that is allegedly infringed. 

Regards,
[signed]
[private]
Authorized Agent
